response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Before we dive into the specifics, I would like to extend an exclusive offer for you. For a limited time only, you can acquire this valuable asset for $12,000. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive training session to help you maximize its benefits. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, or if you'd like to discuss further.", "product_price": 12000}
